nodes.message: Award trophy for wearing the School Uniform if it's currently equipped.

nodes.text: Since the thief only comes out late at night, I might as well enjoy myself for a while.
No point in searching for him before bedtime.
They look like Drats, but they're HUGE!

nodes.message: Removed spawning unless you came from the Rogue Dorm Hall

nodes.text: That was probably the Thief! Who else would be up this time of night?
Okay, it definitely came this way. Was that a door closing?
That's definitely a door sound. I think the noise came from the center of the hall...
Okay, so where did that Thief go?

nodes.message: Putting First Aid Journal entries here because it feels better to get the journal entry after class
Using the same logic (minus hours, due to tag above) as seen in the Enter script for Infirmary. Would prefer to have a var to check, though didn't think it was worth adding at this point

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid - A New Start
nodes.description:
Time for First Aid, round two! I'm hopeful these new classes will give me an even better time handling injuries - especially to my own person.

Today mostly covered setting bones and safe practices, but Lady Moira did mention bringing lots of mushrooms to future classes. I'd better keep an eye out, just in case!

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid Lesson 2 - Prep Work
nodes.description:
More garden work today, but I'm excited that we're finally going to get to crafting real medicines soon! We start with a Healing Pill tomorrow. I need to gather as many puffballs as I can - I guess they're a major ingredient in Healing Pills?

Otherwise, the class just talked about taking care of yourself and keeping fit. I suppose a few more sessions of climbing rope couldn't hurt...

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid Lesson 3 - Healing Pills
nodes.description:
Making a Healing Pill is a lot of work! It takes 10 whole Puffballs just to make a batch of 3 Pills! I'm glad Lady Moira keeps the other ingredients in stock, I'd never remember them. Guess that means I'm stuck making them only in class... oh well. Just need to look for more mushrooms.

On that note, it seems like I'll have free time at the end of class most days to make a few extra supplies! That should prove really helpful.

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid Lesson 4 - Agility Pills
nodes.description:
It's Agility Pills today: 10 Morels for a batch of 3. It's nice to be able to avoid those queasy after-effects of eating the morels straight, though.

If we keep learning more recipes, I'm going to have trouble deciding what to craft during class. I'll have to plan carefully to avoid wasting my time.

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid Lesson 5 - Magic Pills
nodes.description: Magic Pills today! I think I'm noticing a theme. These pills take 10 Fairy Parasols to craft but should greatly enhance my ability to take a magical explosion to the face... of course, I'll just take Lady Moira's word for that.

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid Lesson 6 - Fitness Pills
nodes.description: Today we tackled a tricky one - Fitness Pills. It takes multiple mushrooms! 4 Puffballs, 4 Morels, and 4 Fairy Parasols. That's going to cut into my supplies for all the other types of pills considerably... but at least I get 5 pills out of the deal.

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid Lesson 7 - Perception Pills
nodes.description: Today's craft required a new type of mushroom I'm suprised we hadn't covered before - the amanitas. It's apparently quite poisonous, but mixing it with Chanterelle can completely nuetralize the negative effects. So the recipe is 5 Amanitas, 3 Chanterelles, and 2 Fairy Parasols to create 3 Perception Pills. The Perception Pills increase intelligence, which is a bit ironic. Who would've guessed that eating something so poisonous was actually the smart thing to do?

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid Lesson 8 - Antidote Potion
nodes.description:
I can't help but think some poor soul failed spectacularly at our last lesson and ingested too much Amanitas. It seems so fitting that right after learning about the crazy dangerous poison mushroom, we're now introduced to the concoction that can nuetralize it: The Antidote Potion.

For a meager 5 Chanterelles, 4 Puffballs, and 1 Fairy Parasol I can craft an important tool for staying alive. Sigh... these recipes aren't going to get any easier, are they?

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid Lesson 9 - Healing Potion
nodes.description:
Today we added the Healing Potion to our repetoire. It's about time we learned it. 5 Puffballs, 3 Fairy Parasols, and 2 Morels to develop a single flask of the stuff.

Healing Potions are "must have" items for any hero, and especially for a rogue. I hope I have the materials to craft more next class.

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid Lesson 10 - Full Heal Potion?!
nodes.description:
This is some kind of cruel joke. Lady Moira seemed so kind, but now she's introduced us to the most advanced potion only to tell us we won't be able to ever make any. I mean, sure, we could spend a year waiting around for it to mature... but who's got time for that?

I am grateful she gave us one, though. Maybe I'll save it for a truly rainy day... like the Final Exam in the next class. Ugh.

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid - The Finals
nodes.description:
Another day of free crafting! ... well... after another grueling exam, that is. No sense worrying about it now, though. It's over and I won't know how I did until next class.

Speaking of, the next class is the last time I'll be able to make use of all the crafting recipes I learned... I should make sure to stock up beforehand.

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid - Last Day
nodes.description: I got my test results back and it looks like I passed with flying colors! I really can be a decent student, if I put some effort in. It's a shame I won't have any more classes here. I shudder to think that if I run out of supplies I'll now have to.. buy them! Gah.

nodes.name: Advanced First Aid - Last Day
nodes.description: I got my test results back... it didn't come out too great. I'm a little disappointed, but the real shame is I won't have any more classes here. I shudder to think that if I run out of supplies I'll now have to.. buy them! Gah.

nodes.name: First Day of First Aid
nodes.description:
I decided to take First Aid as an elective, taught by Moira Glenshannon. She'll be a nice change of pace from Master von Urwald. Less sneering, at least.

The class should be useful, though. Everybody needs to stay healthy, after all! If the rogue thing doesn't work out, maybe I can use what I learn here to craft and sell bandages and herbal remedies to folks. That's kind of like being a doctor, right? Mom would be proud!

nodes.name: First Aid Lesson 2 - Wrapping Up
nodes.description: Apparently bandages are far more complex than I gave them credit for! Admittedly I glazed over as the lecture went on, but I caught enough to make me afraid of bandages made of anything besides the materials provided here in class. Infections are scary and disgusting! To boot, I now know how to properly wrap a wound. No more bow knots for me!

nodes.name: First Aid Lesson 3 - Garden Hearty
nodes.description:
Lady Moira showed us around the Tower Garden today. It's a lot of work managing the plants, but luckily for us, she does the lion's share of it outside of class. 

Beyond digging around, we discussed differences between various plants and fungi. I already knew the difference between a mushroom and a flower, but hey, never hurts to be sure! 

From here the class will focus on identifying particularly handy plants and how to use them. I just hope we start with the money tree!

nodes.name: First Aid Lesson 4 - Much Ado About Mushrooms
nodes.description:
More garden work today, with a special focus on mushrooms. Apparently some mushrooms are poisonous, so I'll need to be careful before just casually popping one in my mouth.

Hey! Wait a sec! I wonder if this class will end up teaching me how to make my own poisons?

... unfortunately I'm guessing no. Lady Moira doesn't seem the type and there's probably some code about it she'd never break.

nodes.name: First Aid Lesson 5 - Puffballs
nodes.description: The infamous Puffball was the topic today. It's a curative plant, but also makes your stomach sick when eaten raw. What irony. I think I'll be able to handle it during combat if I really needed to, but no reason I need to force them down otherwise. Oh, and Lady Moira gave us each three to keep. Finally, free stuff!

nodes.name: First Aid Lesson 6 - Morel Authority
nodes.description: Today's class was on the mighty Morel. It tastes good cooked, but gives an amazing boost to agility when eaten raw! There might be something to this whole organic movement after all. Morels are found growing on dead trees or on exposed roots in caves. Next time I'm spelunking I'd better keep an eye out for some!

nodes.name: First Aid Lesson 7 - Chanterelles
nodes.description: Finally we have a mushroom you can eat without getting sick: the Chanterelle! Lady Moira really drove home how important this one is. It can stop any poison in its tracks, so it seems incredibly important for a rogue to keep handy - especially one in training. She also mentioned they are very rare and grow in deep caverns... wonder where I might find some of those?

nodes.name: First Aid Lesson 8 - Indigo Policy
nodes.description: I'm starting to think Lady Moira has tailored her class just for me! Today's mushroom was the Indigo Cap, a mushroom that makes you practically invisible! Oh the places I'll go... I got a few, but I can't wait to find more. Hopefully they aren't as hard to find as I will be!

nodes.name: First Aid Lesson 9 - Fairie Parasol
nodes.description: Today we covered the Fairie Parasol, a magical sort of mushroom that can help shield against magical attacks. Probably best if I never need this kind of effect, but always good to keep it handy in the event of a Revenant attack.

nodes.name: First Aid Lesson 10 - Magical Bandages
nodes.description:
Today it finally all came together... with mortar and pestle in hand, I was able to craft a bandage with incredible healing ability! It took a lot of materials... 3 Puffballs, 2 Fairy Parasols, and 6 Bandages gives me just 3 Magical Bandages. But each one is a masterpiece, and proof that I'm doing pretty well at this!

Next class is the quiz, though. I'd better study up and make sure I know my stuff.

nodes.name: First Aid Quiz
nodes.description:
Class took place in the garden again today, after a quick quiz. I'm not sure how I did on ithe quiz - it didn't leave mushroom for error. But I doubt the downtrodden who have need of a hero check GPA's.

The next class will be the last one of the semester. I wonder if I should take the advanced First Aid courses or pick something else?

nodes.message: Quiz had 5 questions, this mimics the logic behind Moira's responses during class

nodes.name: First Aid - End of Session
nodes.description:
Today was the final First Aid class for the session. It was mostly review in the garden, but I did get to find out my grade on the quiz... I got a great score! Maybe that career as a medicine man isn't so far fetched afterall?

I still need to figure out if I'm going to take the advanced courses. Lady Moira gave out a Healing Potion to everyone to entice us. It's pretty convincing... to think, I could one day craft this!

nodes.name: First Aid - End of Session
nodes.description: Today was the final First Aid class for the session. It was mostly review in the garden, but I did get to find out my grade on the quiz... I didn't do so well. But at least I got some nifty mushrooms out of this course.

nodes.name: First Aid - End of Session
nodes.description:
Today was the final First Aid class for the session. It was mostly review in the garden, but I did get to find out my grade on the quiz... I did pretty well! I'm not so bad at this medical stuff after all.

I still need to figure out if I'm going to take the advanced courses. Lady Moira gave out a Healing Potion to everyone to entice us. It's pretty convincing... to think I could one day craft this!
